entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
